stem: A 30-year-old white primigravida asks you about the benefits and drawbacks of corticosteroid therapy for premature labor at 30 weeks gestation. Which one of the following statements is most accurate?
opt1: Therapy will decrease the risk of neonatal necrotizing enterocolitis
opt2: Weekly corticosteroid injections until 34 weeks gestation is the standard regimen to prevent respiratory distress syndrome
opt3: Therapy is associated with a higher rate of neonatal intraventricular hemorrhage
opt4: Therapy is associated with a higher rate of persistent patent ductus arteriosus
